class_notes: (Course in the Community) (HYBRID: online live synchronous sessions will be Wednesdays 6:30-8:30pm; in addition. Candler students will be required to participate in a 1 hour weekly on-campus discussion group, the time for which will be announced prior to preregistration)
course_description: Howard Thurman's writings and ministry focused upon the meaning of personal commitment and social transformation as they reflect religious experience. The course explores how spirituality influences concepts of community and assesses the practical implications of such concepts.
schedule_location:
W 6:30pm-8:30pm in ONLINE
M 1:30pm-2:30pm in ONLINE
